July 15, 1899 D Pontypridd Contest (Class C)
Pontypridd Contest (Class C) 30 Test Piece Contest Pontypridd Contest pontypridd-contest-class-c
Recollections of Carl Rosa
Taff Vale Park, Pontypridd 9th annual South Wales and Monmouth Contest 7 bands entered, 4 competed
1st prize £7. 2nd prize £4. 3rd prize £2. 4th prize £1.
April 14, 2012, 2:08 p.m. Aug. 27, 2018, 7:02 p.m.
1 Cwmmawr Henry Bentley
2 Pentre Volunteers Robert Dawson
3 Fochriw Robert Dawson
4 Caerphilly E. P. Burrows
